title: Ticket #3948: Event Log Rotation Test Work
description:
Condor Log Rotation Testing

At this time 9/2013 the only real log rotation testing is on the event log(age unknown). We want to make sure we log by size and by time. We want to assure that if we want one plus 3 that we actually get a four file rotation.

We also want a test for the windows only infinate loop if we have a log file xxxxxxxx.todd which shows up after the other logs.

We derived from tool a new tool condor_testwritelog to let us exercise the log writing code path. It installs from condor_base into sbin.

Some useful param settings are these based on how the tool represents itself. 

  MAX_WRITELOG_LOG = 50000000
  WRITELOG_LOG = $(log)/WriteLogLog
